subdisciplines.name: Presocratic Philosophy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the philosophical ideas and teachings originated before the time of Socrates.

subdisciplines.name: Plato Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the philosophy and works of Plato.

subdisciplines.name: Aristotle Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the philosophy and works of Aristotle.

subdisciplines.name: Hellenistic Philosophy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the philosophical schools and movements emerged in the Hellenistic period.
